Unarmed.description: While Unarmed this model will suffer -1 to their Duel and To Wound rolls.

Spear.description: A Spear is a Single-Handed weapon. Infantry models may assist friendly models with the same size base or smaller as long as they are in base contact. The model with a spear may then contribute a single attack to the Fight using its own Fight Value and Strength. Models with a spear may use it as a hand weapon, but may not make special strikes when using it. In multiple combat the model using a spear may strike a different target to the model they are supporting.

Lance.description: A Lance is a Single-Handed weapon. Cavalry models using a Lance adds +1 to their To Wound rolls. (Other rules that allow for re-rolls on natural 1's apply before this bonus). This additional bonus applies to other Cavalry models as long as the model wielding the LAnce charged this turn (and it is not within Difficult Terrain). Cavalry models will normally replace their Lance with normal Weaponry if dismounted.

War Spear.description: A War Spear is a Single-Handed weapon. A war spear follows the rules for spears for Infantry models, and lances for Cavalry models.

Sword.description: A Sword is a Single-Handed weapon

Axe.description: A Axe is a Single-Handed weapon

Pick.description: A Pick is a Single-Handed weapon

Two-Handed Axe.description: A Two-Handed Axe is a Two-Handed weapon

Whip.description: A Whip is a Throwing Weapon with a range of 2" and Strength 1

Pike.description: A Pike is a Two-Handed weapon. Infantry models with pikes follow the same rules as spears, although models may support in base contact two models deep. Models supporting in this way will be unable to Back Away if they lose the combat. Pikes require two hands to use and as such if a model is also equipped with a shield, bow or crossbow it will suffer a -1 penalty to Duel rolls.

Dagger.description: A Dagger is a Single-Handed weapon.

Staff.description: A Staff is a Single-Handed weapon.

Staff Of Power.description: A Staff Of Power is a Hand-And-A-Half weapon (declare its use as a Single-Handed or Two-Handed weapon before the start of a Fight), the bearer can expend 1 point of Will per turn without reducing their own Will store.
